long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly source candidates and clients from any platform with Kakoo Easy Sourcing, a powerful extension for efficient recruitment.

Features:

	•	Multi-Platform Sourcing: Quickly source candidates, contacts, and companies from various hiring platforms with a single click.
	•	Customizable Fields: Personalize the extension by adding custom fields to capture key information for candidates, clients, and contacts, aligning it with your unique sourcing needs.
	•	Smart Duplicate Detection: Keep your database clean with advanced duplicate detection, which not only identifies duplicates but also updates existing profiles in Kakoo with any new information captured.

Download now to streamline your sourcing like a pro!

For more information, visit our support page.

Browser Permissions Overview (Chrome Web Store Compliant):

	•	Cookies: Used to store user login information.
	•	Kakoo App Access: Connects the extension to your Kakoo account for data retrieval and storage.
	•	Declarative Content: Embeds extension features on websites, allowing seamless access.
	•	Active Tab: Ensures proper integration with the active tab.
	•	Tabs: Identifies tabs actively communicating with the extension.
	•	Privacy: Enables third-party cookies for seamless login if already logged into the app.
